text: The Mali national football team (French: Ã‰quipe du Mali de football) is the national association football team of Mali. The team has never qualified for the FIFA World Cup, but they have participated in the Africa Cup of Nations 10 times. The Malian team was suspended by FIFA on 17 March 2017. == References == == Other websites == *Tout sur le football Malien *Mali at FIFA.com *Mali Football Category:African national football teams Category:National sports teams of Mali Category:Football in Mali
title: Mali national football team
